document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Apparently </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">surprise </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">happy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Flower </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Frost </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">beheads </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">play </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">accidental </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">power </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">blonde </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Assassin </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">passes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">proceeds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">unmoved </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">measure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">off </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">another </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">Day </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Approving </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Apparently with no surprise
